syn 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Return the number of words in a string

Source: R/n-words.R
n_words.Rd

Return the number of words in a string

n_words(x)

Arguments

x

a string

Value

vector of numbers

Examples

syn_end <- syn("end")
syn_end_words <- n_words(syn_end)
syn_end[syn_end_words <= 1]
